ThingDef.label: AI assistant microcomputer
ThingDef.description: The AI Assistant is an advanced, multi-functional tool designed to support the daily tasks and well-being of the user. It comes in the form of a microcomputer that attaches directly to the user's brain. Initially the AI Assistant is only equipped with some basic functionalities. However, its true potential is unlocked through the installation of specialized software modules, which greatly expand its functionality and enables it to offer expert guidance in a wide range of fields.\n\nFor ease-of-use the microcomputer is designed to be self-installable via a small handheld injector. After injection the unit releases a web of ultrafine wires across the host’s brain to thoroughly attach and integrate itself with the host. Due to the way the AI assistant microcomputer integrates itself with the host it cannot be removed.

HediffDef.label: AI assistant
HediffDef.description: An installed AI assistant. The AI Assistant is an advanced, multi-functional tool designed to support the daily tasks and well-being of the user. It comes in the form of a microcomputer that attaches directly to the user's brain. Initially the AI Assistant is only equipped with some basic functionalities. However, its true potential is unlocked through the installation of specialized software modules, which greatly expand its functionality and enables it to offer expert guidance in a wide range of fields.\n\nFor ease-of-use the microcomputer is designed to be self-installable via a small handheld injector. After injection the unit releases a web of ultrafine wires across the host’s brain to thoroughly attach and integrate itself with the host. Due to the way the AI assistant microcomputer integrates itself with the host it cannot be removed.

AbilityDef.label: AI assistant control interface
AbilityDef.description: Temporarily enables the control interface for the AI assistant allowing various settings to be enabled.

HediffDef.label: AI assistant (control interface)
HediffDef.description: The control interface of the AI assistant has been temporarily activated. It will automatically deactivate after some time has passed.

AbilityDef.label: enable painstopper
AbilityDef.description: Enables the painstopper function which completely nullifies the users perception of pain.

AbilityDef.label: disable painstopper
AbilityDef.description: Disables the painstopper function allowing the user to once again perceive the sensation of pain.

HediffDef.label: painstopper (AI assistant)
HediffDef.description: Through the use of the AI assistant the user has had their perception of pain completely nullified. This effect can be removed by reconfiguring the AI assistant.

ThingDef.label: AI assistant animals module
ThingDef.description: The animals module enriches the AI Assistant with a vast database of animal-related information. This includes detailed profiles on animal species, their behaviors, dietary needs, habitats, and breeding patterns. It allows the AI Assistant to provide instant insights and strategic advice to the user when interacting with animals.\n\nFor ease-of-use AI modules are packaged in a small handheld device. When in close proximity with an AI assistant microcomputer the unit can be enabled to wirelessly transfer its data. Due to the way the modules are designed however, they can only be used once.

HediffDef.label: animals module
HediffDef.description: An installed animals module. The animals module enriches the AI Assistant with a vast database of animal-related information. ThingDef.label: AI assistant construction module
ThingDef.description: The construction module enriches the AI Assistant with a comprehensive library of architectural designs, structural engineering principles, and advanced building techniques. It allows the AI Assistant to provide real-time guidance and visual feedback on construction projects, from planning and material selection to execution and maintenance.\n\nFor ease-of-use AI modules are packaged in a small handheld device. When in close proximity with an AI assistant microcomputer the unit can be enabled to wirelessly transfer its data. Due to the way the modules are designed however, they can only be used once.
